with all of the ro spinoffs popping up lately thought would share an old incomplete project ragnarok asgard legend for those of you who would rather just browse the site first here link http www asgardlegend com there bit to read on the main site especially under job class but lot of link are likely to be missing and there no registration or forum so read on hope this isn removed for advertisement since this project isn open nor is it likely open any time soon if ever just thought some people would find it interesting to read about since there are so many ro spinoffs and cash grab here project spinoff that wasn intended just to make money off of the ro name and wa started because of the love of the original and desire to bring more ragnarok to ragnarok fan what is ragnarok asgard legend this project is more of remake than sequel ragnarok online is an old game and despite offering lot of unique feature seen nowhere else it feel quite lacking compared to modern mmos the goal wa to remake ragnarok online with the intent of keeping all of the aspect of the original game while fixing and adding thing to the game that to make it more than just grind from level to 99 the project infancy the team started with rathena a base and wiped all item monster npc etc until we were left with just mean of login character creation and server hosting by starting with clean slate we were able to optimize normalize lot of feature across all npc and add more dynamic to the game itself when you try to go back and add feature retroactively it usually doesn turn out well for instance the new questing system for ro being mostly broken and working for some quest but not all by starting with nothing we can ensure that all feature like the quest window work across the board and not just in some place this applies to more than just quest and allows the game to feel more fluid all around rune midgard a opposed to feeling like one team handled one city and some other team with other intent handled the next city what the same or similar the client and server backend are the same mentioned earlier that we started with blank rathena the mechanic and calculation regarding most aspect of the game are pre renewal based a we felt that pre renewal mechanic were more unique to ro and allowed for more versatility say based because although they are similar they are not identical you could expect lot of skill to function similarly but maybe slightly altered for balancing purpose in some case you ll also see the same visuals same town job class and monster from ro alongside some new addition or change and this is about where the similarity end the result from keeping these thing similar is retaining the original ro1 feel while allowing for lot of new experience the goal is to provide that initial fun learning and exploration feeling of playing new game all while still feeling like the classic ragnarok online that we all love what different there quite bit different for the most part if it wasn listed under similarity expect it to not function the same a ro1 ll try to bullet point a many of these thing a can remember you ll notice lot of feature that make the world more interactive and dynamic overall a well a lot of change to how class and feature are handled for u this wa three step process step when introducing new mechanic skill or feature we had to first make sure that it wa in line with how the original ro played this mean that nothing is mandatory and player can build their character and play the game how they choose the original ragnarok online is one of the few non linear mmos where the player hand isn held throughout the whole game directing the player where to farm what quest to do and what skill stats equipment to use although there is more of an overarching storyline that can be followed from level 99 it is designed in such way that it is entirely optional there are still plenty of side quest if you choose to learn the lore of midgard asgard at your leisure just a in ro1 this also mean that no feature can feel out of place know this is pretty subjective but the intent is that everything should be professionally done and well thought out almost a if the game wa originally launched with said feature step secondly feature and adjustment have to be properly aligned and balanced with the rest of the game feature and content in our case the aim wa to not have any absolute best or crutch feature content this can be quite difficult to do without lot of testing ro1 had lot of crutch system where if you didn do or didn have item you were at major disadvantage or were just intentionally making the game more difficult for yourself these sort of crutch system are nearly impossible to get rid of but the goal is to minimize it a best a possible without making every class and every play style feel exactly the same one of the problem we had with renewal step lastly implement and play through the content to analyze the feel of the content and make adjustment a needed assorted feature and mention here are some assorted bullet point and quick bit of information a much a can recall you can find some image on the main site redesigned novice class the novice class ha separate skill to level instead of the original basic skill going to level most pservers out there offer lot of custom command for convenience but we always thought typing bunch of command took away from the game however you ll still find some command implemented in skill form available a novice for example the monster memory skill function very similarly to mi monsterinfo the novice class also ha access to basic vending ability ability to call mount in some situation and ability to pick up item faster than clicking on each item a result of novice having thing like vending other class function slightly differently though still have the same feel new modified skill most class have few entirely new never seen before skill alongside some unmodified and modified ro1 skill a of the time of this post only 1st class job have been completed the intent wa to provide more way to play each class and to balance existing skill all while still maintaining the feel of the class thief should still be stealthy merchant should still be interested in money trading etc clan guild player can join both clan and guild a they serve very different function clan have lot of influence on the environment and town dynamic world while guild have more of an influence on castle related activity like woe and castle dungeon the goal with clan is to create some innate rivalry like seen with race in other game without making player feel isolated from the rest of the world pet pet have lot more functionality besides just being monster that follows you pet can be leveled up evolved fight alongside you and offer various ability to help you on your journey there lot more use for pet but nothing out of place weather we ve added dynamic weather system to the game you may experience rain fog sandstorm snow normal weather etc all dependent on which part of the world you are in and what the weather is like that day weather is also more than just visuals a different weather condition very slightly impact combat and influence dialogue with npc dynamic world a mentioned above there are lot of variable that influence how npc react and how you will engage in combat more than what mentioned ro1 had very stagnant world and completing quest or event had zero influence on the world around you and the rest of the game ragnarok asgard legend is quite bit le stagnant in this regard weapon and armor variation weapon are now found from monster with various small ability and function attached to them effect are minimal but do stack with the original weapon card system with weapon variant alone there are million and million of combination to allow for very unique weapon friend play this feature allows you to de level in order to continue partying with friend there is the usual 15 level range for sharing exp but with friend play you don every have to worry about out leveling friend you ll always be able to hop into party with them regardless of each others level player are returned to their normal level once friend play is deactivated and are still rewarded in different manner for exp gained a de leveled character town event this go in line with the dynamic world these can be triggered accidentally or intentionally and provide lot of unique experience for those involved profession the last thing ll mention are profession there are currently three profession which offer various crafting ability to aid you on your journey every player can choose one profession to have alongside their job class some job class offer an extension of the profession like an alchemist shaman combo but every class now ha some level of minor crafting ability in order to add more to your character uniqueness others there quite bit that different that may be on the site or not bet rest assured that it all follows the same principle a stated above ll try to cut this list of feature here be sure to look under the game tab of the website for anything else that might not be listed current status in it current state ragnarok asgard legend is about 40 towards where we wanted to launch with episode the original plan wa to have progression of episode like the original ro had so the launch would have been episode containing enough content to play the game for many many hour but with plenty of content still to come this project wa started about year ago a side project amongst myself and two other admin devs however the rest of the team besides myself have moved on with life and are no longer developing the project it pretty massive project and currently only get worked on or maintained sparingly by myself a it very hard to find trustable and competent devs not currently hiring besides that like that it fairly stress free for me to work on a hobby when not busy with grad school work or family amp nbsp anyway thought that since lot of various ro project and spinoffs pop up all the time you guy might find this old project interesting feel free to ask away or leave your thought and comment

randomness doe not mean equal probability after reading over and over the debate a to the meaning of randomness a used by nexon ve written this post with the intention of settling the matter conclusively the community will probably frustrate my intention but at least tried tldr if nexon describes something a random but also specifies that it ha unequal probability rate then this is not contradiction get that it not intuitive to everyone but that why it important to read widely according to wiktionary http en wiktionary org wiki randomness the three common definition of randomness are given in this order boldface is my emphasis the property of all possible outcome being equally likely mathematics type of circumstance or event that is described by probability distribution measure of the lack of purpose logic or objectivity of an event sense equal likelihood of outcome this sense of randomness is intuitive for many people in fact it is the only sense permitted by the definition of simple random sampling for example http www ab gov au ausstats ab nsf a493a524d0c5d1a0ca2571fe007d69e2 with simple random sampling each item in population ha an equal chance of inclusion in the sample this sense of randomness is so intuitive that nexon wa pressured http www reddit com maplestory comment lq9r4j why_the_kms_players_have_lost_their_shit_and_you to include caveat whenever they advertise item with uncertain yet unequal outcome sense probability distribution this sense of randomness is also intuitive for many people but it more technical one would argue the definition given by wiktionary could be bit more precise though it capture the essence of why the topic of randomness is confusing randomness involves uncertainty in individual outcome but the distribution of many outcome can be measured and even programmed therefore describing event a random is misleading only to the extent that equal likelihood is inferred nexon is now more explicit about the fact that outcome are determined according to set probability rate the cube revamp http maplestory nexon net news 80182 239 neo tokyo patch note and cannot see any misleading conduct to be admitted in this scenario sense apparent lack of logic this sense of randomness is bit more colloquial but it touch on people experience of frustration with uncertain outcome it can be compared to and is even contained in wiktionary first definition of arbitrary http en wiktionary org wiki arbitrary based on individual discretion or judgment not based on any objective distinction perhaps even made at random great in game example would be the enormous variance encountered in star forcing suckhard star forcing calculator http brendonmay github io starforcecalculator can readily demonstrate this it also an apt example of how this sense of randomness doe not entail equal likelihood and the game even tell you what the likelihood are conclusion if nexon describes something a random but also specifies that it ha unequal probability rate then this is not contradiction get that it not intuitive to everyone but that why it important to read widely the word random is used inconsistently across context and it behooves u not to read unwarranted assumption into them

if you re currently doing nwill hwill in party and are planning on doing hwill solo in the future consider practicing for it now tl dr hwill solo is mechanically much more difficult than hwill in party mainly because p3 moonlight generation is extremely scarce practice dodging everything during your chill party run so that it ll be easier when it time for your cracked solo achievement made this post because these are few thing wished knew when first started attempting hwill solo it you some time ago fresh 250 25k stat ready for nwill but you ve never done it before luckily someone wa nice enough to teach you the basic mechanic of all the test and how to survive full run in party remember how overwhelming the bos looked when you first started don worry about the chip damage and suddenly the bos seemed so much more manageable few run later you re solid you ve learned the test you know the one shot you know what kill you you re the guy with 10 life at the end of your run fast forward few month and maybe some lucky starforce event you have the damage you are ready for your solo achievement you go in web cover the screen and in about minute and you lose all of your life with counterplay what happened a you know during p3 everyone need to be clearing web so that the screen doesn get covered with people generating moonlight it doesn matter a much if your moonlight generation is slower if you re the only one generating moonlight however you need absolutely every sliver of moonlight if you are going for solo you cannot ignore the chip damage anymore which brings u to the title why not start practicing now you re already doing weekly hwill the chip damage mechanic do not change throughout all phase what generates moonlight and how do speed it up you passively generate moonlight you don generate moonlight while dead contrary to popular belief you don get more moonlight by hitting him more you lose moonlight if you get hit by red ball red eye gt ball in star pattern you stop generating moonlight if you get hit by anything this mean in p3 you need to be dodging every little bit of chip damage at least a best you can and especially dodge those red ball the margin for p3 are razor tight single red ball can and will ruin your run there so much shit everywhere how the fuck do dodge all this chasing dark orb if you jump into them while they are high they will pop without you taking damage you can also flash jump through them tp class have it harder but think you can walk into them and then tp away leg leg leg everywhere reaction time basically don be stuck holding down your attack key get used to the timing and spacing red ball they re pretty slow and their pattern is predictable will himself pushing you into everything stand on top of him chase as when he ready his attack animation in p2 with the fakeouts you are the only one in there he will always always aggro to you and attack in your direction if he looking at you and suddenly show you his as that 100 fakeout doing my best but p3 is still hard a fuck fuck these web when the screen is completely webbed out don lose hope just yet this is the time to get all resistance character to 120 full second of iframe is enough to generate one cleanse hero will erda will can buy you even more time krr ring and other iframes can also help and don lose hope even small improvement in mechanic will buy you more and more time in p3 alright give up trying to buy time in p3 how can do more damage burst with poison is pretty common strat he will usually cast poison within the first 30 second of starting the phase this will give you large final damage boost which may be enough to shorten your p3 time dodging and attacking is difficult but there may be class specific thing you can do to avoid mechanic while still maintaining damage uptime watch video of someone doing min dmg run or ask your class discord remember that once webbed out it not over yet stall out the timer and wait for burst to come back so you can utilize resistance link ideally you should have no le than life going into p3

reboot where to grind sellas to limen edition please note this guide help is only for people who want to maximize exp rate not meso familiar node rate it been while since totem were removed and with that the whole one map is best should have went with it however see lot of people haven actually caught up to that and religiously stick to one map for 10 level the common advice is run ba and go with the highest kill rate map that you have access to this is actually not true most of the time and can actually stunt your exp rate lot of people overlook the 20 bonus base experience that is granted for within level of the mob you are killing simplified way of thinking of this is 15k kill within level range 18k kill at base exp have attached few table have made using information about spawn point have gathered from various place including reddit inven amp checking map myself when really dubious about number it likely these are not all correct feel free to correct anything you feel is not true didn check every single map am not that insane the table outline the base exp per hour if you full clear the map then go on to show your exp rate depending on your level difference the result is that map really only have level shelf life for being the optimum map for your experience amp x200b sellas http preview redd it vfblvtnzumia1 png width 540 amp format png amp auto webp amp enabled amp e7928b950a39c6134bbfbe8a89acc9843748f52e amp x200b moonbridge http preview redd it ym842v14vmia1 png width 543 amp format png amp auto webp amp enabled amp 08973c70be9636e84eeb504b89a6ae9fbaba852a amp x200b lab http preview redd it 3rdlmrd7vmia1 png width 543 amp format png amp auto webp amp enabled amp 21d2d309895216870d1cb4c8b45ba7adb8304127 amp x200b limen http preview redd it gn8c0w09vmia1 png width 542 amp format png amp auto webp amp enabled amp 2269cc7b14657ca4b0a0ee9fb35641fbe5a32ab1 example you can make 29 2b base exp per hour at lh4 when you are lvl 249 level 250 and level 251 but actually when you are lvl 252 you only make 26 8b and mf1 27 7b mf3 29 6b and mf4 29 3b and even mf5 28 2b become better map if you can clear them they also likely have better burning also in sellas you have the option of sss6 which will still give you 30 4b but no familiar with all these option available there is much higher chance of finding map that are burning with all exp modifier running you are looking at around total exp per 10 of burning so 100 burning would be 30 total on top of the rate listed here lab v moonbridge see people staying in lh6 until limen and skipping labyrinth however there are actually ton of viable in labyrinth that beat out moonbridge amp limen at the same level limen only really becomes better at level 260 261 in most case at which point you would probably want to swap to cernium a the rate there are just insanely better unless you are funded enough to clear the powerful 1k af mob which are better from the moment you unlock limen which are always better tldr for optimum exp rate people should be swapping map nearly every level from 245 onwards and probably before but haven got time to look up every single map in the arcane river right now note if your only goal is to get familiar and mesos node you should just stay in the highest kill count map if your goal is to level up faster then you should go for the highest exp per hour map not the highest kill per hour note these rate are really just comparison guide it really unlikely you will maintain the optimum rate in any map hope this help if it is useful maybe can do lvl 200 280 rather than just 245 260

some detail about kaling p1 mechanic so far taken from various streamer namu wiki an inven post level 285 sacred power req 330 for full damage p1 is made up of three minibosses the peril introduced in hoyoung storyline sans taotie towards which you can allocate up to two player to during the entry period all of the minibosses are immune to bind and must be defeated in order to enter p2 amp x200b player allocation menu http preview redd it jvd0gxdbslia1 png width 1487 amp format png amp auto webp amp enabled amp fd31320d56aa64ff77b00322a779d2b26b9a313d player allocation menu amp x200b the party share 1000 mental point life total which is drained when being hit by certain pattern there is no life count a in most other boss dying simply remove 50 mental point amp x200b mental point meter http preview redd it b1zjz6pyqlia1 png width 260 amp format png amp auto webp amp enabled amp 907364539690069bf339d224860195109cdff1fb the major mechanic of p1 is the balance gauge which is divided into three segment one for each bos at the start of the fight each miniboss will have 500 point of this gauge summing to 1500 it seems that being hit from certain pattern will increase your miniboss psa you can get more haste booster by doing all haste mission on multiple character after doing all the haste mission on single character you end up with booster and super booster have found that you are able to get an additional booster if you do all of the mission again on another character after hitting claim all here is the important part though do not claim the haste reward individually after each mission wait until you have all mission completed and then hit the claim all button to get the booster from what ve tested hitting that claim all button will give you booster for each mission you ve cleared minus one doesn give you any extra super booster or hase feather and you won get any booster by claiming each mission individually you re able to do this on a many character a you re willing though you re really only limited by time a doing all the mission take like 30 40 minute happy grinding
